name: Unnamed
description: End of cycle Banking rewards are decreased.
tooltip: Banking reward multiplier is reduced from 75 to 50.

name: Unnamed
description: Capturing Star rewards for destroying Economy are increased.
tooltip: Increased from 10 credits to 25 per Economy point.

name: Unnamed
description: Research points from Science are increased.
tooltip: Research contribution from Science is increased from 1 to 2 points per Science.

name: Unnamed
description: Capital Stars have an increased Defender Bonus.
tooltip: Capital Stars have x2 Defender Bonus.

name: Unnamed
description: End of cycle Experimentation rewards are increased.
tooltip: Experimentation reward multiplier is increased from 50 to 100.

name: Unnamed
description: Trade cost is increased to 'Very Expensive'.

name: Unnamed
tooltip: Weapons technology is fixed at Level 7.

name: Unnamed
description: The number of specialist bans is increased.

name: Unnamed
description: Increased starting credits and specialist tokens.
tooltip: Credits are increased by x2 (max 3000) and Specialist Tokens are increased by x2 (max 100)

name: Unnamed
description: Gain more rank from playing games.
tooltip: Rank rewards are increased by x2 on top of any other multipliers (special games grant x2).
